model.name: views
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW twoServiceView ( TRANSACTION_ID integer, ACCOUNT_ID integer, PRODUCT_ID integer, PURCHASE_DATE timestamp, SHARES_COUNT integer, PRIMARY KEY(TRANSACTION_ID) ) AS SELECT TRANSACTION_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PURCHASE_DATE, SHARES_COUNT FROM HOLDINGS;

model.name: H2AccountsSource
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE HOLDINGS ( TRANSACTION_ID integer NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT DEFAULT '(NEXT VALUE FOR PUBLIC.SYSTEM_SEQUENCE_799FFA1A_D4D7_4F90_B980_9D2EBF7A845F)' OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"TRANSACTION_ID"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'INTEGER'), ACCOUNT_ID integer OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"ACCOUNT_ID"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'INTEGER'), PRODUCT_ID integer OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"PRODUCT_ID"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'INTEGER'), PURCHASE_DATE timestamp OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"PURCHASE_DATE"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'TIMESTAMP'), SHARES_COUNT integer OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"SHARES_COUNT"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'INTEGER') ) OPTIONS ("UPDATABLE" 'TRUE', "NAMEINSOURCE" '"HOLDINGS"');
